title: How to Draw a Real Tree

steps.headline: Gather all the necessary materials like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
steps.description: For colouring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.

steps.headline: Draw the stand of the tree .
Add cylinders around the lines that will shape the tree trunk and branches.
Draw circles, large in the middle and small ones at the end of the branches, for the tree crown.
Draw a contour of the tree trunk.
Draw irregular lines for the tree crown.
Add more details and more leaves.
steps.description: Add bark details on the tree trunk. Make it as realistic as you can.

tyn: Colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors
text: Gather all the necessary materials like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum. For colouring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors. Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely. Draw the stand of the tree .  Add cylinders around the lines that will shape the tree trunk and branches.  Draw circles, large in the middle and small ones at the end of the branches, for the tree crown.  Draw a contour of the tree trunk.  Draw irregular lines for the tree crown.  Add more details and more leaves. Add bark details on the tree trunk. Make it as realistic as you can. Colour the tree.
sentences: Gather all the necessary materials like paper, pencil, pencil sharpener and eraser gum.
For colouring, you can chose from colored pencils, crayons, markers or watercolors.
Use quality paper so your color will come out nicely.
Draw the stand of the tree .
Add cylinders around the lines that will shape the tree trunk and branches.
Draw circles, large in the middle and small ones at the end of the branches, for the tree crown.
Draw a contour of the tree trunk.
Draw irregular lines for the tree crown.
Add more details and more leaves.
Add bark details on the tree trunk.
Make it as realistic as you can.
